attributes.action: Ensure fraudulent MP"s expense claims are investigated  by an independant police unit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ensure a full and frank open  investigation by the police into the matter of fruadulent claims by MP's . Ensure that MP's who can not justify claims are prosecuted for suitable offences and removed from public office.

rejection.details: It is for the police to decide whether to investigate or not. Please contact them directly.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
